com.joliciel.talismane.sentenceDetector

Class SentencePerLineCorpusReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.joliciel.talismane.sentenceDetector.SentencePerLineCorpusReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AnnotatedCorpusReader, SentenceDetectorAnnotatedCorpusReader

    public class SentencePerLineCorpusReader
extends Object
implements SentenceDetectorAnnotatedCorpusReader
    A default corpus reader which assumes one sentence per line.
    Author:
    Assaf Urieli

      The number of cross-validation segments for this corpus.
      void setExcludeIndex(int excludeIndex)
      Which index to exclude when reading (for training), from 0 to getCrossValidationSize-1.

      Which index to include when reading (for evaluation), from 0 to getCrossValidationSize-1.
